string.value: I think I hear someone's groaning somewhere in Dragon's Canyon. Sounds like someone's injured...

I ran into #b#p2081007##k, who was badly injured on the ground at Dragon's Canyon. Raul explained to me about his mission, and asked if I could finish it for him. The mission is to bring back #b#t4001094##k safely, which Horntail kidnapped, back to its nest. He says If I defeat Horntail and bring #b#t4001094##k back to its nest, I will be able to meet someone...

I defeated Horntail and returned #b#t4001094##k back to its nest as #b#p2081007##k, the Dragon Squad leader. Then I saw #b#p2081008##k hatch from the egg. Will the baby dragon survive on its own in Minar Forest?

string.name: message
string.value: 나인스피릿 아기용의 힘찬 울음소리를 듣자 신비로운 힘이 솟아오른다.
You ... how did you find me?\r\n#b#L0# You seem to be really hurt. Are you alright?#l
This is nothing. I'm just deeply ashamed of myself for failing to take care of the mission given to me because of this petty injury.\r\n#b#L0# What mission?#l

My name is Raul, the leader of the Dragon Squad that helps Nine Spirit protect the Minar Forest. I was in a battle against the Horntail, which was threatening the safety of Minar Forest, but ultimately I lost. Not only that, I wound up losing #b#t4001094##k in the process. My task now is to recover that egg. \r\n#b#L0# But you really look like you're hurt.#l
Yes... while retreating from the battle, I was ambushed by the Wyverns. I am seriously in need of help here. Will you help me out?

I am right now in no shape to complete the task that's been given to me. This is why I want you to take care of this mission in place of me. Horntail is currently hiding out in the Cave of Life. If you manage to defeat it, you'll be able to recover #b#t4001094##k.

After recovering #b#t4001094##k, you'll need take it to Nine Spirit's nest on top of the Cave of Life, which is where #b#p2081008##k will soon hatch out of the egg. That baby dragon represents hope in this forest.
You'll always be the one responsible for determining what's right and what's wrong for you. If you happen to change your mind, please come visit me.

(Unable to understand exactly what the baby dragon is crying out loud, but just listening to it roar makes my skin tingle with joy and excitement at the prospect of it growing up to be the next dominant dragon in this area.)
#b#t4001094##k has to be placed on its nest in order for the baby dragon to hatch out of the egg. Please complete this mission ASAP. I'm counting on you.
